messages.title: The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take frontline action to protect frontline NHS services. We will put more police on patrol, restore the pensions' earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces. We can make this pledge because we have identified real savings to pay for it. The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.

messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: OUR NHS: At risk with the Conservatives. Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss. David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners. Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg’s tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

He will work with the Liberal Democrat Councillors on Barnet Council to: prevent development on Green Belt land, provide solar panels on public buildings, stop the Conservative plan to scrap the sheltered housing warden service.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.

quotes.text: Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss
We've lived with this mistake for 60 years now ... The reality [is it the NHS] hasn’t worked - it has made people iller
quotes.source: Senior Conservative MEP Dan Hannan, Summer 2009

images.caption: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
